RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States Magistrate Judge: United States Department of Homeland Security
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the defendants: RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent who stopped RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan and testified about his knowledge of rental car companies and his observations of the defendants' driving
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRI: Defendants with motions to suppress recommended for denial by the United States Magistrate Judge, whose driving behavior was observed by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck involved in a traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., and possibly equipped with a camper shell, used by smugglers, which was driving "on and off the road"
